name: Playlist-Builder
description: This web-app uses the Deezer music API to allow users to create their own playlists

name: Express Note Taker
description: This is a simple express app the allows the user to take and save notes through local storage

name: Celestial Navigator
description: Allows users to check their horoscope and get readings for their future.

name: Campify
description: This web-app uses the RIDB API to gather information about camping, hiking, and other outdoor activities.
